subject: College Athletics
Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: With the N.C.A.A. investigating the Ohio State program, Tressel, who led the Buckeyes to their first national championship in 34 years, stepped down in “the best interest” of the university.
snippet: With the N.C.A.A. investigating the Ohio State program, Tressel, who led the Buckeyes to their first national championship in 34 years, stepped down in “the best interest” of the university.
